name: MIEICrawler
description: MIEICrawler is a 2D dungeon-crawler game developed for the course of Desenvolvimento de Jogos de Computadores (Development of Computer Games) at FEUP (Faculdade de Engenharia do Porto). It features 5 levels, each one with a unique boss. To power up, the player has passive skill trees for the 3 diferent active skills. It also contains interesting logic puzzles for computer engineers.
